name: Pendant
description: A heart-shaped pendant, intricately designed with an engraving that reads 'Forever yours.'

useEffect.message: The ghost's eyes light up as he sees the pendant.

name: Family Photo
description: A faded photo of a smiling family, edges worn and torn.

useEffect.message: The ghost whispers: 'They were my world...'

name: Toy Car
description: A small, red toy car with chipped paint.

useEffect.message: The ghost murmurs: 'A gift for a special little boy...'

name: Knife
description: A rusted kitchen knife with a cracked wooden handle.

useEffect.message: The ghost sighs: 'I wonder what this could be for?'

name: Lipstick
description: A vibrant red lipstick in a golden tube.

useEffect.message: The ghost exclaims: 'What a pretty colour! I wonder if they still make it...

name: Gloves
description: A pair of delicate lace gloves.

useEffect.message: The ghosts face softens: 'These would be perfect for a wedding'

name: Sweater
description: A soft cashmere sweater, with a faint scent of lavender

useEffect.message: The ghost stares at you and smirks: 'It smells like it was just worn by...'

name: Ring
description: A generously sized stone, placed on a gold band. It looks tarnished.

useEffect.message: The ghost grunts and moves closer to you. He whispers: 'Put it back.'

name: Purse
description: A purse, left untouched. Filled with miscellaneous items.

useEffect.message: The ghost looks at you perplexed: 'I don't think that belongs to you?'
